title: Parliament Budget Session 2022 Live Updates: President Kovind lauds Centre’s welfare schemes, says India running world’s largest food distribution drive - The Indian Express
content:
1. Parliament Budget Session 2022 Live Updates: President Kovind lauds Centre’s welfare schemes, says India running world’s largest food distribution drive  The Indian Express

description: Budget 2022 India Latest, Economic Survey 2022 Live Updates, President Ram Nath Kovind Speech Live Updates: Prime Minister Narendra Modi, while addressing reporters outside the Parliament, said tomorrow's Budget will showcase India's economic growth to the world.
